title.value: Коррекция микробиоценоза кишечника молодняка свиней препаратами микробиологического синтеза
Enhancement of gastrointestinal microbiota in young pigs with preparations of Microbiological synthesis

journal.title: Animal Agriculture and Veterinary Medicine : quaterly research and practice journal

person.name: Sadomov, N.A., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: The evidence presented in this paper goes to prove that probiotics

uniformly populate the digestive tract of young pigs and have a stimulating effect on the formation of lacto- and Bifidobacterium flora in the gastrointestinal tract, inhibit opportunistic pathogenic microflora, which leads to the lowest colonization of gastrointestinal tract by parathyphoid enterobacteria. Effectiveness, availability, convenience and ease of use, high biological activity of probiotics
allow one to recommend their production as immunostimulants for enhancement of immunogenesis and natural intestinal microbiota of piglets
